Hello there - I am Lisa. I'm an aspiring frontend developer. I'm currently doing an internship, and working on getting my Frontend Development & Design degree.

About Me

Hi! I’m Lisa, an aspiring frontend developer passionate about creating intuitive and visually appealing web experiences.

With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I’ve built dynamic websites using Node.js, Express, and EJS, while also exploring modern frameworks like SvelteKit and Astro.

I love crafting accessible, high-performance websites and enjoy diving into creative coding from time to time!
